name: Sushi Maze
description:
Introducing a throwback to 80's games, a game to test your time management.

Are you up for the challenge, CHEF?

You have a time limit to find all the sushi ingredients inside a maze and get out of the maze.

There is a hidden ability to freeze the time for a few seconds to get your best remaining time at victory. 

What are you waiting for?

Try it now on Sushi-Maze "Play on fullscreen" - Unity Play

Or to play in better performance download the game.

Download Sushi-Maze now on Windows and Mac!

If you enjoyed the game, don't forget to support us by voting for us "Scavato" team on the below link https://unigamedev.nine66.gg/voting
